name: Disciple of Bolas
originalText: When Disciple of Bolas enters the battlefield, sacrifice another creature. You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is that creature's power.

rulings.text: If you control at least one other creature when the ability resolves, you must sacrifice one. If you don't control any other creatures at that time, the ability won't do anything.
The creature's power as it last existed on the battlefield is the amount of life you gain and the number of cards you draw.
